description: Source file defining the 'Home' component for a Lightning.js project, which displays a welcome message and a list of recipe cards fetched asynchronously.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: A Lightning.js component that manages loading and display of recipe list with cards.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Asynchronous lifecycle method that fetches recipes and updates component state.

calls: listRecipes({ sort: { by: 'rating', dir: 'desc' }, page: 1, pageSize: 6 })
